TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientSettingsProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider implements class System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider
Public Class ClientSettingsProvider Inherits SettingsProvider Implements IApplicationSettingsProvider
type ClientSettingsProvider = class inherit SettingsProvider interface IApplicationSettingsProvider

summary.span: 使基于 Windows 的应用程序可以从 Web 设置服务中检索用户设置。

span.span: Enables Windows-based applications to retrieve user settings from a Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过配置应用程序以使用从现有的 Web 设置服务检索用户设置类。You can use client application services to retrieve user settings from an existing Web settings service by configuring your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 完成配置后，可以获取和设置用户设置，通过应用程序设置类派生自并配置为使用类。After configuration, you can get and set user settings through an application settings class derived from and configured to use the class. 您可以使用 Visual Studio 生成`Settings`为你的项目的类 (作为访问`Properties.Settings.Default`在 C# 和`My.Settings`在 Visual Basic 中)。You can use Visual Studio to generate a `Settings` class for your project (accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 有关应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information about application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). 您可以检索当前通过属性使用完全限定类名称作为键。You can retrieve the current through the property using the fully-qualified class name as a key. 您还可以检索提供程序通过属性在处理时事件。You can also retrieve the provider through the property when you handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于类的所有成员。This class contains a at the class level that applies to all members of the class. 如果直接调用方是安全透明或部分受信任，引发运行时异常。A run-time exception is thrown if the immediate caller is security-transparent or partially trusted. 有关安全关键类型和成员的详细信息，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For more information about security-critical types and members, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个派生的类不具有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来显示未成功保存的设置的列表。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过应用程序设置系统并不应由应用程序代码使用它在内部使用此方法。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]扩展性模型调用方法来初始化使用应用程序配置文件中的信息。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the by using information in your application configuration file. 此方法还可以识别以下 Web 设置服务配置属性：This method recognizes the following Web settings service configuration attributes: - namename - 说明description - connectionStringNameconnectionStringName - serviceUriserviceUri 有关这些属性的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

summary.span: 将所有用户设置都重置为其默认值。

span.span: Resets all user settings to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过应用程序设置系统并不应由应用程序代码使用它在内部使用此方法。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. 若要为其默认值重置 Web 设置，通常使用项目的方法`Settings`类 (通常作为访问`Properties.Settings.Default`C# 中和`My.Settings`在 Visual Basic 中)。To reset Web settings to their default values, you will typically use the method of your project's `Settings` class (typically accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 此外可以通过调用恢复为以前缓存的值的 Web 设置方法。You can also revert Web settings to the previously cached values by calling the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 设置服务位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web settings service location.
The URI of the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性在应用程序代码中，但你通常将应用程序配置文件中设置值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这使您无需重新编译你的代码更改的服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 当以编程方式设置服务位置时，必须指定完整的服务 URI，它将始终以"Profile_JSON_AppService.axd"结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Profile_JSON_AppService.axd". > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置 Web 设置服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the Web settings service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#303)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#303)]

summary.span: 在设置提供程序尝试将属性值保存到 Web 设置服务时发生。

span.span: Occurs after the settings provider attempts to save the property values to the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件发生后设置提供程序将访问设置服务，即使未成功保存设置。This event occurs after the settings provider accesses the settings service, even if the settings were not successfully saved. 提供程序可能无法保存设置的一个原因是当前用户如果具有已注销。可以使用属性来确定是否已成功未保存任何设置。One reason that the provider might fail to save the settings is if the current user has been logged out. You can use the property to determine whether any settings were not successfully saved. 如果设置提供程序无法访问的设置服务，而是将导致提供程序引发此事件不会发生。This event does not occur if the settings provider cannot access the settings service, which instead causes the provider to throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来显示未成功保存的设置的列表。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]
